content: Known for her powerful voice and soulful ballads, which British singer released the hit albums "19," "21," and "25"?

That would be Adele, one of the most celebrated singers in recent history. Her albums "19," "21," and "25" have all been massive successes, each containing chart-topping hits that resonated with audiences worldwide. Her powerful vocals and emotionally charged lyrics have earned her numerous awards and a dedicated fan base.
